channel.title: Royale with Cheese - Detroit's #1 Burger Destination
channel.description: Updates from Royale with Cheese - Pulp Fiction themed restaurant featuring gourmet burgers, craft shakes, and signature bites in Midtown Detroit

item.title: Now Open in Midtown Detroit!
item.description: We're excited to announce that Royale with Cheese is now open at 4163 Cass Ave in Midtown Detroit! Experience our famous Big Kahuna Burger and $5 Shake in a Pulp Fiction themed atmosphere.

item.title: Happy Hour Special - 3-6 PM Daily
item.description: Join us for Happy Hour! Get 20% off all burgers and $2 off craft shakes Monday through Friday, 3-6 PM. The perfect way to experience Detroit's best burgers!

item.title: Student Discount - 15% Off with Valid ID
item.description: Wayne State students get 15% off their entire order with valid student ID. Fuel your studies with our gourmet burgers and shakes!
